snippet.title: Shadow Puppeteer Official Wii U Launch Trailer [PEGI]
snippet.description:
Available now on Wii U!

Invite a friend to explore the strange, yet beautiful world of darkness and light in Shadow Puppeteer, an award-winning, local co-op adventure. Work together as a boy and his shadow, manipulating light to solve puzzles that bring you closer to finding the villain who separated you from one another: the evil shadow puppeteer.  

Follow Shadow Puppeteer
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ShadowPuppeteer
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/SPuppeteerGame
Website: http://www.shadowpuppeteer.com
